> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight gasped with horror and didnt stopped to shake

The first thing that was seen as the door opened was GUILEDART's right
arm, the one that ended in a cannon that looked much like the
triceratops head from his beastmode.

STAMPY immediately leaped to the side as SHARPEDGE tried to orient his
own weapon on GUILEDART.

However the larger bot was already ready, and a single blast from him
sent the SHARPEDGE flying into the wall behind him, he slid back on
the ground, apparently dazed.

GUILEDART oriented his weapon arm on STAMPY and NIGHTLIGHT, "You two."
He said, surprisingly not firing on them at first but pausing instead
to speak. "I have been tracking your movements ever since you left the
last chamber. Enter now, and bring your friend with you."

GUILEDART motioned to STAMPY and NIGHTLIGHT that they were get the
still dazed SHARPEDGE and enter the room.

Something was really strange here, a Predacon seeming to help a MAXIMAL?

(TAG)

- Preston
